short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your experience of CSES problemset solving

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can
● You can add notes for a task. (The text editor is somewhat styled like notion, implemented with the help of EditorJs), and
● You can mark a specific task that you liked as a favorite.

To use the extension,
1) Add the extension to chrome.
2) Visit https://cses.fi/problemset/
3) Login to your account and refresh the page.
